experiment.sample-preparation:
Extract DNA from cells/tissue and quantify with a Qubit fluorometer. Shear 500 ng–1 µg DNA to ~200–500 bp using a Covaris sonicator. Perform end repair with an end repair enzyme mix (e.g., NEBNext), incubating at 20°C for 30 minutes. Add an ‘A’ base to 3' ends using a Klenow enzyme, then incubate at 37°C for 30 minutes. Ligate Illumina-compatible adapters (10:1 adapter
molar ratio) and incubate at 20°C for 15 minutes. Purify ligated DNA with AMPure XP beads, eluting in 20 µL Tris-HCl (10 mM, pH 8.5). Amplify adapter-ligated DNA with 6–8 cycles of PCR (98°C for 10 s, 65°C for 30 s, 72°C for 30 s, with an initial 30 s at 98°C and final 5 min at 72°C). Perform two-step AMPure XP bead size selection for ~300–400 bp fragments. Quantify the library (Qubit or qPCR) and assess size on a Bioanalyzer or TapeStation. Dilute library to ~4 nM for HiSeq loading; pool if multiplexing, denature, and load onto the HiSeq instrument for sequencing.

Perform end repair with an end repair enzyme mix (e.g., NEBNext), incubating at 20°C for 30 minutes. Add an ‘A’ base to 3' ends using a Klenow enzyme, then incubate at 37°C for 30 minutes. Ligate Illumina-compatible adapters (10:1 adapter
molar ratio) and incubate at 20°C for 15 minutes. Purify ligated DNA with AMPure XP beads, eluting in 20 µL Tris-HCl (10 mM, pH 8.5). Amplify adapter-ligated DNA with 6–8 cycles of PCR (98°C for 10 s, 65°C for 30 s, 72°C for 30 s, with an initial 30 s at 98°C and final 5 min at 72°C). Perform two-step AMPure XP bead size selection for ~300–400 bp fragments. Quantify the library (Qubit or qPCR) and assess size on a Bioanalyzer or TapeStation. Dilute library to ~4 nM for HiSeq loading; pool if multiplexing, denature, and load onto the HiSeq instrument for sequencing.

Extract DNA from cells/tissue and quantify with a Qubit fluorometer. Shear 500 ng–1 µg DNA to ~200–500 bp using a Covaris sonicator. Perform end repair with an end repair enzyme mix (e.g., NEBNext), incubating at 20°C for 30 minutes. Add an ‘A’ base to 3' ends using a Klenow enzyme, then incubate at 37°C for 30 minutes. Ligate Illumina-compatible adapters (10:1 adapter
molar ratio) and incubate at 20°C for 15 minutes. Purify ligated DNA with AMPure XP beads, eluting in 20 µL Tris-HCl (10 mM, pH 8.5). Amplify adapter-ligated DNA with 6–8 cycles of PCR (98°C for 10 s, 65°C for 30 s, 72°C for 30 s, with an initial 30 s at 98°C and final 5 min at 72°C). Perform two-step AMPure XP bead size selection for ~300–400 bp fragments. Quantify the library (Qubit or qPCR) and assess size on a Bioanalyzer or TapeStation. Dilute library to ~4 nM for HiSeq loading; pool if multiplexing, denature, and load onto the HiSeq instrument for sequencing.
